info:credits: You can use your stored credits to reduce the cost of your subscription.

phoneMessage: The change of telephone number will be verified by SMS code. Make sure the number is not already in use on the platform.
password:info: We recommend that you change your password annually to maximize the security of your account.
toPayMessage: Don't forget to renew your subscription before your subscription expiration date if you want to continue to see the evolution of your crypto pairs.
shareMessage: Share your sponsorship code around you and share the Predictmarket network with those around you and your subscribers. totalMessage: Total affiliates and earnings since signing up.
consultListAffiliates: Consult the list of your affiliates.

paymentIncident: Any payment incident may result in a suspension of services and is subject to services and is subject to late payment penalties calculated on the basis of three times the legal interest rate in force in France, with a minimum lump sum France, with a minimum fixed compensation of 40 euros
